pullRequest.title: Bug Fix #1219 : Check style failure in windows machine
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Resolved check style failure in windows machine.
Issues
#1219
#984
Tested environments
Tested in Windows

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)
